reference.title: Command: jobconf
reference.shortdesc: Submits live job reconfiguration requests, updating configuration settings in active memory without restarting daemons.

refsyn.title: Synopsis
refsyn.synph: jobconf action object_type=object_name "value_pair[;value_pair...]"] [-c "comment"] [-f] jobconf hist [-l|-w] [-o object_type] [-u user_name] [-T time_period] [-a action] [-f config_file] [history_file] jobbconf disable bconf -h [action [object_type]] jobbconf -V

refsyn.title: Action synopsis
refsyn.synph: addmember usergroup | hostgroup | queue | limit | gpool=object_name "value_pair[;value_pair ...]" [-c "comment"]
